text: Dimitris Avramopoulos (born 6 June 1953) is a Greek politician. He is a member of the New Democracy party. He was Mayor of Athens from 1995 to 2002. He was the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for National Defence between 2012 to 2014. He was EU Commissioner for Migration, Home Affairs and Citizenship in the Juncker Commission between 2014 and 2019.Toby Vogel (July 28, 2014), Greece nominates Avramopoulos as European commissioner European Voice. ==References== ==Other websites== * New Democracy website * Greek Parliament site * Dimitris Avramopoulos site * www.elections2014.eu Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Athens Category:European Union politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Greece
title: Dimitris Avramopoulos
